attributes.action: not have limitations on student rail cards before 10am.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The student rail card is limited so that before 10am any ticket under £12 does not get the 1/3 off rail costs. Many students who do travel to college on train in the mornings can not use the rail card. Having a student rail card that allows 1/3 off at all times would be a great help to the cost of travel.
